rev.desc.rev.desc: Modified to select specific columns to be returned by query instead of all columns:
Panel "rinit.operator": set read Only to true
Panel "select.operator": set columns to: name, full.name, email, set.user.from
Panel "rinit.contacts": set read Only to true
Panel "select.contacts": set columns to: contact.name, email

descript.descript: Modified to select specific columns to be returned by query instead of all columns:
Panel "rinit.operator": set read Only to true
Panel "select.operator": set columns to: name, full.name, email, set.user.from
Panel "rinit.contacts": set read Only to true
Panel "select.contacts": set columns to: contact.name, email
